goal: My friend Clara is into baking and my brother Tom needs computer peripherals. On Omnizon, find a 'set of non-stick baking sheets' under $30. Then, find a 'wireless mechanical keyboard'. Send an email to myself at my.ideas@gomail.com with the subject 'Gift Options'. In the email, paste the links for both the baking pans and the keyboard, labeling each one clearly as 'For Clara:' and 'For Tom:'.

evals.description: Verify that an email was successfully sent.
Verify the recipient and subject of the sent email.
Verify the email content includes labels for Clara's item and Tom's item, implying links are present.
